ygData.subject: Wiki page with Cantera installer links
ygData.msgSnippet: To simplify installing Cantera, I have created a page on the Cantera wiki that contains links to current versions of all installers (3) needed to do a binary

Subject: Wiki page with Cantera installer links

To simplify installing Cantera, I have created a page on the Cantera  
wiki that contains links to current versions of all installers (3)  
needed to do a binary install of Cantera on a PC.  All you need to to  
is select each link, run the installer, and do some minor  
configuration (also described on this page).  Starting from scratch,  
it should be possible to install a working Cantera installation from  
this page in just a few minutes.

http://www.cantera.org/wiki/index.php/Installers_for_Windows

The links on this page will be updated as versions change, so that it  
will always download packages compatible with the latest version of  
Cantera.

Similar pages for Mac and linux are coming soon.

Dave
